alert.note: Alert for Hamilton (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 6:58PM EST until March 05 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers... Great Miami River at Miamitown. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO SUNDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Great Miami River at Miamitown. * WHEN...From late tonight to Sunday morning. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Water approaches summer cottages along the Great Miami River near Miamitown. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM EST Friday the stage was 14.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Saturday morning to a crest of 17.1 feet early Saturday afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 16.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
